item.description: Completed LEGO Hogwarts Castle. Completed 5km in 30min.

item.title: Born to be an artist?
item.description: I donâ€™t believe I was born an artist; rather, I became one through a series of fortunate events.

item.title: Bridging Cultures Through Art: My Journey of Creative Exchange
item.description: Art has always been a powerful medium for expressing cultural identities and bridging differences. Throughout my artistic journey, I have had the privilege of engaging in cultural exchanges that have profoundly shaped my understanding of art and its role in fostering cross-cultural dialogue. The Seed of Cultural Exploration: My First Journey to the UK My journey in cultural exchange began at a young age when I was just eleven years old.
